DOC.detailed_description: Validation methodology : Ten ( 10 ) independent qualified practitioner train operate device accordance Directions For Use ( DFU ) , complete Device Usability aspect study , ask perform simulated procedure without device indicate DFU one-hundred ( 100 ) subject use follow subject population sample table .
